@chem41: This is not appropriate place for such topic. Out there is many forums and pages about encoding. I use my own software, but it's obviously useless for public, therefore I often recommended in past two best and free programs: HandBrake and more advanced MeGUI and use of their built-in templates/profiles/settings. Just Google both.
